message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this great product, and I think you'd really find it valuable. I'm asking for $140 to start. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $120. Let me know if this is within your range.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $120 is a bit too low for me.  Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $130?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I am still unable to pay more than $125 for the product. I hope this meets your needs.
